name: JJ Hiew
title: Co-Founder
description: JJ is a software engineer that's been developing web and mobile applications for over 10 years.  As CTO of Merscient Inc, he has helped launched numerous global online marketing platforms for clients such as IBM, GE, and Castrol Wakefield. JJ graduated from UofT with a B.Sc in Computer Science.

name: Ben Zelikovitz
title: Co-founder
description: Ben is a Director at Sitescout and has 10+ years of experience in Enterprise SaaS sales and operations.  Prior to that, Ben was an Account Manager for Randstad Canada's technology recruiting division. Ben graduated from Wilfrid Laurier University with a B.A in Political Science.

name: Trevor Zeyl
title: Co-founder
description: Trevor is a business lawyer at the prestigious Norton Rose Fulbright LLP and specializes in M&A. He attended the University of Windsor and the London School of Economics where he attained his JD and LLM respectively.
